alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Graham; Logan; Norton; Sheridan; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 1:49PM CST until January 03 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch and total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches; higher snowfall amounts may be possible and winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of east central Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ this evening to 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ Tuesday. Best chances for ice accumulation will be late tonight through the day on Monday. Best chances for accumulating snow will be Monday night through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slick and difficult road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Power outages and tree damage are possible from ice accumulation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on the wintry precipitation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Decatur; Graham; Logan; Norton; Sheridan; Wallace
